name: Wyoming Beef Jerky Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Cheese. Beef jerky. McCormick® Brown Gravy Mix. Need we say more? Well, it's easy, too! Prep time is 5 minutes and you can bake it to ooey-gooey goodness in another 15. Scoop this filling dip onto crackers and enjoy the game.
ingredients: 1 cup shredded white Cheddar cheese, divided
1 (.87 ounce) package McCormick® Brown Gravy Mix
2 ounces beef jerky, shredded or cut into bite-size pieces
directions: Mix cream cheese, 1/2 cup of the shredded cheese, sour cream and Gravy Mix in medium bowl until well blended
Spoon into glass pie plate sprayed with no stick cooking spray
Bake 15 minutes or until heated through
Serve with crusty bread or crackers
